name: Nights & Days
description:
You have been chosen to stay at a Luxurious Mansion along with 7 other people. But where is your host?? and even worse, you guys are trapped??? You and the 7 have no choice but to stay and unfortunate murders come along. It is your job to figure out who the murderer is by night 3 to make it to day 4 or else night 3 **will be your last night**. You will be reported of each murder that no one will know of except the murderer themself. 

Credits: 

Sound- Geo

Editing-Geo

Organizer- Corneille

Designer- Terrell
